name: Osprey Sopris 20 Backpack - Women's
description: Technical and lightweight, this smaller backcountry ski pack carries all you need when seeking tracks outside of the resort. Multiple attachment points provide various carry options for your skis or snowboard, and a rear access panel lets you grab your snacks without removing all your gear. Great for in-bounds laps or lightweight backcountry tours.Thermoformed, contoured EVA foam back panel and shoulder straps shed snow.Webbing hipbelt adjusts with a single pull.Large zipper pulls and buckles are designed for use with gloves on.Easily access the main compartment via the rear access panel even with skis attached.Dedicated avi gear storage pocket with wide J-shaped zip accommodates large shovel blades.A lined goggle pocket and an internal zippered pocket organize small items.Internal carry harness for GPS or radio.Stowable helmet holder and ice tool loops ensure you're ready for more technical terrain.Osprey rates this bag as best for loads 7-12kg/15-25lb.
